abstract_summ: Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) has been reported as a worldwide emergency . Due to the extensiveness of spread and death, it has been declared as a pandemic . Review focused on the current pandemic situation and understanding the prevention and control strategies . China has obtained success by ascribing control strategies against the disease . The implementation of China’s strategy, as well as the development of a vaccine, may control the pandemic of COV-19 .
